eng:
Which of the following descriptions of the image is incorrect?
- (1) Many motorcycles are parked in front of the building.
- (2) The building has a modern glass exterior.
- (3) There are trees lined up along the street.
- (4) The exterior of the building is gray.

Which of the following descriptions of the image is incorrect?
- (1) Several chefs are wearing hats.
- (2) The chefs are wearing white uniforms.
- (3) People are using a wooden steamer.
- (4) The chefs are cooking outdoors.

Which of the following descriptions of the image is incorrect?
- (1) It shows people listening to a lecture.
- (2) The presenter is giving a presentation in front of the stage.
- (3) The stage displays the phrase "2025 메디컬 AI 이노베이션."
- (4) All the audience members are wearing red T-shirts.

Which of the following descriptions of the image is incorrect?
- (1) Sliced meat is stacked in layers.
- (2) The sign has a cat drawing.
- (3) There is a bowl of rice on the table.
- (4) There is a coffee machine in the background.
